features.message: PT- RESERVA (NO FLY ZONE) Os voos UAS sao proibidos. Contatar a AAN para mais informacao. EN- RESERVATION (NO FLY ZONE) UAS flights are prohibited. Contact the AAN for more information.

extendedProperties.notam_inf:
AIRSPACE RESERVATION (NO FLY ZONE) WILL TAKE PLACE AREA BOUNDED 
BY:
384156N 0091328W - 384138N 0091248W - 384111N 0091307W -
384133N 0091350W - 384156N 0091328W. NO FLIGHTS ALLOWED EXCEPT STATE 
AIRCRAFT, MEDEVAC, SEARCH AND RESCUE AND TRAFFIC ARRIVING AND/OR 
DEPARTING FROM HUMBERTO DELGADO AIRPORT (LPPT).
TRAFFIC TO AND FROM ALGES HELIPORT (LPJB) SHALL MANEUVER IN ORDER TO 
AVOID THE NO FLY ZONE.
